message.content: {"id": "50793", "title": "Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch", "description": "When a ServletRequestListener is defined and invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC.", "OB": "The bug occurs when a ServletRequestListener is invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch() and the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC.", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
